title: 820-2936 efi
message:
Hello,
I have an 820-2936 that I attempted to flash firmware to with clean ME region. I used the apple 1.5MB ME version 7 since a tool indicated that the stock rom had ME series 7.
I flashed the ROM and it successfully writes and verifies, but when I turn the machine on it beeps SOS. Literally 3 short beeps 3 long beeps, and 3 short beeps.
Anyone have this issue before? Is ME series 7 correct for this machine? 

Thanks,

Stefan
PS - This is for a school system that somewhow locked themselves out of 3 different computers with JAMF software. I fixed 2 macbook airs using this procedure - read clean efi from same model, insert clean me region, change serial #, and flash back.

title: 820-2936 efi
message:
Please upload the original BIOS, there is no need to touch the ME to remove a password.

Check if original BIOS still works of course.
